t: 2:17*r That is, probably about 30 pounds or about 13 kilograms
2:20*r The Hebrew word for guardian-redeemer*i is a legal term for one who has the obligation to redeem a relative in serious difficulty (see Lev. 25:25-55).
3:9*r The Hebrew word for guardian-redeemer*i is a legal term for one who has the obligation to redeem a relative in serious difficulty (see Lev. 25:25-55); also in verses 12 and 13.
3:15*r Most Hebrew manuscripts; many Hebrew manuscripts, Vulgate and Syriac she*i

4:4*r Many Hebrew manuscripts, Septuagint, Vulgate and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts he*i
